title: BRIEF-RENERGEN Ltd Sees LPS And Headline LPS Between 33.3 Cents And 37.19 Cents For Period Ended Aug 31
text:
BRIEF-RENERGEN Ltd Sees LPS And Headline LPS Between 33.3 Cents And 37.19 Cents For Period Ended Aug 31

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 27, 2019 00:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-RENERGEN Ltd Sees LPS And Headline LPS Between 33.3 Cents And 37.19 Cents For Period Ended Aug 31 Sept 26 (Reuters) - RENERGEN Ltd : * JSE: REN - TRADING STATEMENT * RENERGEN LTD - FOR PERIOD ENDED 31 AUGUST 2019 LOSS PER SHARE AND HEADLINE LOSS PER SHARE IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN 33.30 CENTS & 37.19 CENTS * RENERGEN - REASON LPS, HEADLINE LPS INCREASED FOR PERIOD ENDING AUG 31 RELATES TO ONE-OFF COSTS FOR COMPLETING IPO ON AUSTRALIAN STOCK EXCHANGE * RENERGEN - REASON LPS, HEADLINE LPS INCREASED FOR PERIOD ENDING AUG 31 ALSO RELATES TO $40 MILLION LOAN AGREEMENT WITH OVERSEAS PRIVATE INVESTMENT CORP

BRIEF-RENERGEN Ltd Sees LPS And Headline LPS Between 33.3 Cents And 37.19 Cents For Period Ended Aug 31
